Name: Slaughter Cannon 2
About the game: Slaughter Cannon - Continuation of the first part of an exciting physical puzzle! In the game you will find even more exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Immerse yourself in the medieval atmosphere and take control of a killer cannon and destroy everything in your path! There are many unique buildings and levels waiting for you in the game, so go through them all! Game Features: - Lots of levels - Complete destruction of objects - Physics - Colorful graphics
Meta Title: Slaughter Cannon 2: May 18, 2022, Enoops and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Slaughter Cannon 2? Check out the release date (May 18, 2022), developer insights from Enoops, and a complete game summary.
